CropDeals is an organization aiming to help farmers get best prices for their crops. By using our platform, the need of middleman ends thus removing the profit cutting on selling. Dealers can avail best deals by buying directly from the farmers.
Our app provides hassle-free experience to users. We\'re commited to provide best user-experience by bringing out new updates regularly. Feel free to provide your valuable feedback and help us improve.
